fulltext:
Nguyen Minh Thanh 
Email:   
Mobile:  
Day of Birth:  1986 
AREA EXPERTISE 
 Operating Systems: Windows, Linux, Mac OS
 Programming Languages: PHP 
 PHP Frameworks: Laravel, Phalcon, Codeigniter, Zend Framework 
 Javascript libraries:, Node.js, Vuejs,  Socket.io, Bootstrap, jQuery 
 Database: MySQL, Postgresql, Mongodb , Redis, Memcache 
 Experience working with remote data via REST and JSON (Web-Service), Soap 
 Experience in Social Network Open API ( Google , Facebook, Yahoo ) 
 Integration payment gateway: zing, soha, 1pay, vnpt-epay, ngan luong, paypal 
 Experience about build backend system as tracking user, payment, items… 
 Having knowledge of social games & online games industry 
 SCM: SVN, Git 
 OOP analysis and design  
 Quick researching and applying in task 
WORKING EXPERIENCES 
March, 2017–Current  IMGROUP 
Tech Lead 
Project: Ecommerce Website 
Project Overview:  
Build full module & theme Ecommerce website by Laravel 
Duration: from 2017 to present 
Participants: 1 FE, 2 BE, 1 QC 
Responsibilities:  
 Technical Communication with CEO on requirements 
 Business analysis, product optimization, quality assurance, progress 
and user experience (performance, ease of use, as well as product 
stability) 
 Research and application of new technologies to make new features 
and continuous improvement of modules launched 
 Manage the work progress of members in the scrum team 
Project: Itop.Website 
Project Overview:  
The system create an ecommerce website with subdomain. Build backend 
tracking customers, websites and tools : create multi web, create free ssl, 
assign primary domain…  
Duration: from 2017 to present 
Participants: 1 Fullstack, 1 QC 
Responsibilities:  
 Business analysis, product optimization, quality assurance, progress 
and user experience (performance, ease of use, as well as product 
stability) 
 Manage the work progress of members in the scrum team 
March, 2016–March, 2017  Public Corporation 
Senior Developer 
Project: Winplay – Casino Game 
Project Overview:  
Build api & backend for mobile game 
Duration: from March 2016 to present 
Participants: 1 Web Service, 3 Unity, 1 QC 
Responsibilities:  
 Technical Communication with PM on requirements 
 Build api service 
 Build game master tool : tracking user, payment, items… 
Project:MY PHIM 
Project Overview:  
Watch movies on 3G mobile 
Duration: from March 2016 to present  
Participants: 1 Web Developer , 1 Java Developer 
Responsibilities:  
 Developing wap & web myphim.vn 
 Build system recharge money every day. 
April, 2013 – Oct, 2015  Vua Tro Choi 
PHP Lead 
Project: Pokiwar – Web Game 
Project Overview:  
A kind of casual game where you have to conquer pet by fighting 
Duration: from April 2013 to – Oct, 2015 
Participants: 1 Web Service, 2 Flash, 1R&D, 1 QC 
Responsibilities:  
 Technical Communication with R&D on requirements 
 Planning and managing team member to meet agreed deadline in each 
release 
 Developing new feature, upgrade last feature, fix bug  
 Build game master tool : tracking user, payment, items… 
 Providing technical training and mentoring to new team members 
Project: Age Of Monster – Mobile Game 
Project Overview:  
A kind of casual game where you have to conquer pet by fighting 
Duration: from Jan 2014 to May 2015 
Participants: 1 Web Service, 3 Unity, 1R&D, 3 Art, 1 QC 
Responsibilities:  
 Technical Communication with R&D on requirements 
 Developing main feature 
 Build game master tool : tracking user, payment, items…

Senior PHP Developer

PHP Developer

Collect plant and grow crops with friends as you build the greatest farm 
around

PHP Developer

SOFT SKILLS 
 Excellent in logical thinking. 
 Able to work under high pressure. 
 Fast learning. 
 Good at teamwork. 
 Ability to work independently 
 Reading and Writing English 
EDUCATION 
2004 –2008 
Ho Chi Minh Nong Lam University 
Bachelor -  Information Technology
